data_table.description: Form 44 - Current Medications -- medication use during Main WHI Study (1993-2005)

variable.name: F44VY
variable.comment: Visit year (follow-up visits) or number (baseline visits) for which this form was collected.

variable.name: MEDSEQ
variable.description: F44 Medication sequence id within visit

variable.name: MEDNDC
variable.comment: A description of a medication can be found in the reference file f44ref_meds.dat by merging on the MEDNDC variable. A list of ingredients contained in a medication can be found in the reference file f44ref_med_ingreds.dat by merging on the MEDNDC variable. f44ref files are available only through Authorized Access and can be found in the file labeled "other_for_aa_only_phenotype_files".

variable.name: ADULTDY
variable.description: F44 Adult duration of medication use (days)
variable.comment: Duration (days) of medication use starting at age 20.

variable.name: ADULTY
variable.description: F44 Adult duration of medication use (years)
variable.comment: Duration (years) of medication use starting at age 20.

variable.name: CORT
variable.description: F44 Oral daily use of a glucocorticosteroid
variable.comment: If participant was using a medication in the Corticosteroid (220000s) Therapeutic Class, indicates if the medication was a glucocorticosteroid taken orally and daily.

variable.name: TCCODE
variable.comment:
A description of a medication therapeutic class can be found in the reference file f44ref_med_classes.dat (f44ref files are available only through Authorized Access and can be found in the file labeled "other_for_aa_only_phenotype_files") by merging on the TCCODE variable._x000D_
_x000D_
The first 2 digits of the Therapeutic Class Code represent the Drug Group. The next 2 digits represent the Drug Class within the Drug Group. The last 2 digits represent the Drug Subclass within the Drug Class._x000D_
_x000D_
Example_x000D_
--------------_x000D_
Drug Group:_x000D_
270000 Antidiabetic_x000D_
Drug Class:_x000D_
271000 Insulin_x000D_
Drug Subclass: _x000D_
271010 Mixed Insulin_x000D_
271020 Beef Insulin_x000D_
271030 Pork Insulin_x000D_
271040 Human Insulin
